channel.title: Compiler
channel.description:
this is whats in my compiler
[code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause [/code]
and thats my current java to. in my environmental settings for classpath i have this [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code] and for path i have this [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;[/code]
yet i still cant compile it says java cant be found. help?

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @AsianTony4 AsianTony4
item.description:
@AsianTony4 wrote:

this is whats in my compiler

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

and thats my current java to. in my environmental settings for classpath i have this CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;%CLASSPATH%; and for path i have this C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;

yet i still cant compile it says java cant be found. help?
